lines: 1. Go to dark Gethsemane, Ye that feel the tempter's power; Your Redeemer's conflict see; Watch with Him one bitter hour; Turn not from His griefs away; Learn of Jesus Christ to pray.
2. See Him at the judgment hall Beaten, bound, reviled, arraigned; See Him meekly bearing all; Love to man His soul sustained; Shun not suffering, shame, or loss; Learn of Christ to bear the cross.
3. Calvaryâ€™s mournful mountain climb; There adoring at His feet, Mark that miracle of time, God's own sacrifice complete,'It is finished!'hear Him cry;Learn of Jesus Christ to die.
